ing: 1 teaspoon prepared yellow mustard, or to taste
n: Quick and Easy Mock Hollandaise Sauce
des: "This is a quick and easy substitute for traditional hollandaise."
ins: Whisk mayonnaise, sour cream, lemon juice, mustard, paprika, and hot pepper sauce together in a small saucepan over medium heat until warmed through, 2 to 3 minutes.
